definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: He was interviewed during his visit to Japan this week.
sentences.chinese: 是趁著前两天金范来日时，额外作的访谈。

sentences.english: The direct artifacts and the affirmations are sufficient.
sentences.chinese: 直接工件和访谈证实就足够了。

sentences.english: Method Investigation was carried out by using focus group discussion of medical anthropology.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用医学人类学的专题性访谈进行调查。

sentences.english: Upon completion of follow-up interviews, the data-gathering phase is mostly complete.
sentences.chinese: 完成后续访谈时，数据收集阶段差不多就完成了。

sentences.english: Palin has recently struggled to give clear answers in some highly- publicized interviews .
sentences.chinese: 培林近期在一些高度宣传访谈中努力提出明确的答案。

sentences.english: In this interview, Wang will introduce and play his musics for you.
sentences.chinese: 在访谈期间，王火将为您介绍并演奏他的音乐。

sentences.english: In a previous interview he claimed he did not consider himself sexy.
sentences.chinese: 在之前的一次访谈中，帕丁森称他并不认为自己性感。
我看了一个有趣的访谈节目。

sentences.english: I would urge Mourinho to listen to Spalletti's interviews.
sentences.chinese: 我奉劝穆里尼奥去听听斯帕莱蒂的访谈。

sentences.english: Use the organization chart to identify additional personnel for interviews.
sentences.chinese: 使用组织结构图来确定要访谈的其他人员。

sentences.english: Jim considers himself a 'political junkie' and loves listening to talk radio.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆认为自己“醉心政治”，喜欢听之声访谈。

sentences.english: I worked as an associate producer on the morning talk show, and as an production assistant on several TV comedies.
sentences.chinese: 在早间访谈节目做助理，和几部电视喜剧的制作助理。

sentences.english: I feel uncomfortable during interviews because I need to talk about myself.
sentences.chinese: 在访谈中要聊自己，所以感觉很别扭。

sentences.english: Excerpts from the interview were posted on the BBC Web site Monday.
sentences.chinese: 这次访谈的节选段于周一上传到BBC的网站上。

sentences.english: The interview has been translated from Japanese and edited.
sentences.chinese: 采访用日语进行，以下是经过编辑的访谈内容。

sentences.english: This book is based on seven years of conversations with North Koreans.
sentences.chinese: 这本书也是基于七年来对脱北者的访谈。

definition: to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to talk with sb (face to face)/discussion/talk/chat
to interview (a particular person or on a particular topic)/special interview/special report based on such an interview
to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
